events.message: I have filed a claim regarding a car accident that occurred last night due to another vehicle running a red light.
The submitted claim has been categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report and details of the collision.
An agent was assigned to the case to assist with further investigation and customer communication concerning the car accident claim.
We have acknowledged receipt of your claim and all provided details about the vehicle accident have been noted in our system.
To proceed with processing your claim, please submit the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and repair estimates.
Received all requested documents including police report and pictures of the damaged vehicle as well as repair cost estimates.
Our investigation team has started examining the case details and verifying the accident circumstances for validity.
The investigation concluded that the accident was caused by third party negligence, and coverage will be provided accordingly.
A settlement proposal has been prepared based on the damage assessment and policy terms, awaiting your review and acceptance.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the speed of investigation and is hopeful for a fair and prompt settlement.
Your claim was approved today, confirming coverage for repairs related to the car collision as per your policy limits.
The payment for the approved claim amount has been issued to your bank account to cover the vehicle repair costs.
The claim has been officially closed following payment issuance and confirmation that repairs have commenced.
